articles.title: Critical jsPDF flaw lets hackers steal secrets via generated PDFs - BleepingComputer
articles.description: The jsPDF library for generating PDF documents in JavaScript applications is vulnerable to a critical vulnerability that allows an attacker to steal sensitive data from the local filesystem by including it in generated files.
